nodes.text: Alsakan was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Core Worlds, in grid square L-9 on the Standard Galactic Grid, on the Perlemian Trade Route. It was the homeworld of both Doctor Cornelius Evazan and Allegiant General Enric Pryde. Alsakan contained an Imperial Academy attended by Allegiant General Pryde.
Alsakan culture included military riding traditions, which made use of swaggersticks.

Alsakan was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Ultimate Star Wars, a reference book written by Patricia Barr, Adam Bray, Daniel Wallace, and Ryder Windham and released on April 28, 2015. It was originally created for the Dark Empire Sourcebook, a Star Wars Legends sourcebook written by Michael Allen Horne for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and released on June 1, 1993.
